name: RevisedLevelCells
description: Revise level cells just a smidge.

configdir.name: Edit Personal Phrases Filter + Favorite/Ignored Users
configdir.description:
<cy>(Hopefully.)</c>
This setting does literally nothing new except being a button that acts as a shortcut to open the config directory for this mod (which is kind of important for using this mod properly, because this is where you will store your word/phrases filter and your favorite/ignored users), because the legendary developers in the Geode Team themselves forgot to add a shortcut button that would have done this exact same thing, and I have gotten far too many folks (rightfully) asking me to find the config directory when using some of my other mods, and I hate repeating the same things over and over again, and I don't know if the next major update for Geode will also repeat this mistake where HJfod forgets to include a config directory shortcut button, so this setting and this button are here for extra insurance, so please enjoy this extra button, I guess. Anyway, by the time you're finished reading this, your device should be finished with opening the config directory; press "Aight" to close this window.

updatelists.name: Refresh Personal Phrases Filter + Favorite/Ignored Users
updatelists.description: Refreshes your personal phrases filter and favorite/ignored users list.

applyToLists.name: Apply Changes to Level Lists
applyToLists.description: Apply all possible changes from this mod (blending text + conditional list hiding) to level lists as well.

compactEditorLevels.name: Compact Editor Levels
compactEditorLevels.description:
<cl>Original code by Cvolton.</c>

Compacts your editor levels in "My Levels" menu.

<cy>Due to how this feature is implemented, enabling this option also disables selecting multiple levels for deletion.</c>

levelDescriptions.name: Level Descriptions
levelDescriptions.description:
View level descriptions (and a bit of extra info) without opening the level's page, like with level lists. (Formerly part of ErysEdits.)

<cy>Does not apply to levels in the "My Levels" menu.</c>

recolorSongLabels.name: Recolor Song Labels
recolorSongLabels.description:
<cl>Original idea inspired by Xiyxs.</c>

Color song labels based on their source (Default, Newgrounds, Music Library, NCS).

defaultSongColor.name: Default Songs Color
defaultSongColor.description: Set this to <cj>(40, 210, 255)</c> to keep the original color for levels that use default songs.

newgroundsColor.name: Newgrounds Songs Color
newgroundsColor.description: Set this to <cd>(255, 130, 255)</c> to keep the original color for songs from Newgrounds.

recolorNCS.name: Also Recolor NCS Songs
recolorNCS.description: Differentiate NCS Songs from Music Library songs.

cycleThroughColors.name: Cycle Through Above Colors
cycleThroughColors.description:
If a level contains multiple songs, cycle through the colors you've selected above.

<cy>This will only happen when viewing online levels you have saved and GD hasn't forgotten about.</c>

songCycleSpeed.name: Color Cycling Speed
songCycleSpeed.description:
Sets how quickly (lower value)/slowly (higher value) the song label changes color if <cl>"Cycle Through Above Colors"</c> is enabled.

<cy>Technical limitations from RobTop's end may prevent text from changing color in some menus.</c>

recolorLevelNameFeaturedScore.name: Pulse Level Name Color based on Featured Status
recolorLevelNameFeaturedScore.description:
Pulse the color of a level's name based on its Featured status (<cy>Featured</c>, <co>Epic</c>, <cp>Legendary</c>, <cj>Mythic</c>).

<cy>This will fade the level name's color between white (the default color) and the corresponding color for its featured status.</c>

<cy>Technical limitations from RobTop's end may prevent text from changing color in some menus.</c>

pulsingSpeed.name: Level Name Pulsing Speed
pulsingSpeed.description: Sets how frequently (lower value)/infrequently (higher value) the level name pulses if <cl>"Pulse Level Name Color based on Featured Status"</c> is enabled.

blendingText.name: Readable chatFont Labels (Better Blending)
blendingText.description: Some mods add additional text to a LevelCell. Some of these texts uses the <cl>chatFont font (the one seen in comments)</c>, which makes them difficult to read against thumbnails from <cl>cdc's Level Thumbnails mod</c>. Enabling this makes these texts more readable.

removePlacement.name: Remove Level List Placement
removePlacement.description:
<cl>Original code by Cvolton.</c>

Remove the placement numbers from LevelCells when viewing <cy>PUBLISHED</c> level lists.
<cy>Much like Cvolton's code, this feature will move the percentage label to the left of the</c> <cl>"View"</c> <cy>button.</c>

favoriteUsers.name: Highlight Levels/Lists From Favorite Users
favoriteUsers.description:
Highlight levels/level lists from <co>your favorite users</c>, based on <cl>text files inside this mod's config directory</c>.
<cy>To</c> <cr>remove</c> <cy>someone from your favorite users, visit</c> <cl>this mod's config directory</c><cy>, edit the relevant text file, and</c> <cp>refresh your lists.</c>

<cy>This is a purely cosmetic change. Following a user does not add them to</c> <cl>your favorite users list from this mod</c><cy>.</c>

ignorePeople.name: Hide Levels/Lists From Ignored People
ignorePeople.description:
Hide levels/level lists from <co>people you "ignore"</c>, based on <cl>text files inside this mod's config directory</c>.
<cy>To</c> <cr>remove</c> <cy>someone from your ignored users list, visit</c> <cl>this mod's config directory</c><cy>, edit the relevant text file, and</c> <cp>refresh your lists.</c>

<cy>This is a purely cosmetic change.</c>
<cr>BLOCKING PEOPLE THROUGH PROFILES DOES</c> <c_>NOT</c> <cr>PRODUCE THE SAME EFFECT AS "IGNORING" PEOPLE.</c>

personalFilter.name: Personal Phrases Filter
personalFilter.description:
Hide levels/level lists with names containing <co>words or phrases you dislike</c>, based on <cl>text files inside this mod's config directory</c>.
<cy>To</c> <cg>add</c> <cy>or</c> <cr>remove</c> <cy>a word/phrase from your personal phrase filter, visit</c> <cl>this mod's config directory</c><cy>, edit the relevant text file, and</c> <cp>refresh your lists.</c>

<cy>This is a purely cosmetic change, and</c> <co>does not apply to your own levels/lists.</c>

dontHideIfRated.name: Don't Hide Levels/Lists If Rated
dontHideIfRated.description: Stops hiding levels/lists if the level/list is rated, regardless of why the level/list should be hidden.

issues.info: Ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
